data.body_html:
The Curve Rib Tank, this super soft, stretch tank features a high scoop neckline and a curved hemline. Designed for both comfort and to be effortlessly flattering, this style is a versatile closet staple.

This style fits true to size.

More Details

Fabric: 95% Cotton, 5% Spandex
Made in the United States.

Model wears a size S.

category.full_name: Apparel & Accessories > Clothing > Clothing Tops > Tank Tops
category.name: Tank Tops

data.description:

data.title: Curve Rib Tank Black

data.body_html:
• Emma is 5'11" and wears a size 26
  • 93% MCI COTTON, 5% PCW COTTON, 2% ECO LYCRA
  • Zipper fly
  • Rise: 9", Inseam: 33.5", Leg Opening: 19"

This style runs true to size. This style is designed to sit as a lower mid-rise on the hips.
